summary: This script continuously runs a server using xvfb-run to launch the 'electron' application with the 'launch.js' file, creating a virtual framebuffer environment for graphics rendering in an endless loop.

details.comment: This script continuously runs a server using xvfb-run to launch the 'electron' application with the 'launch.js' file, creating a virtual framebuffer environment for graphics rendering in an endless loop.
